channel.title: Pickup error
channel.description:
Hello,
When a user drops something and wanna pickup that item it works fine, but after a while the item wil not be removed from the ground and the user can pick it up as long as he wants. Somebody knows what this is?
Greetz, Unix

item.title: Pickup error
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Umm, seems to be a small glitch in your pickup system.

Read full topic
